details: HTML tags, HTML attributes, form, button, HTML APIs, HTML Media , class and id have to cover within a day.
CSS Position,Box model, Colors, display, grid and CSS shadow, Transition, media query.
Bootsrap 5 , grid, form, container,card, carousel, tooltip, toast , colors, breakpoint ,display, font size etc.
Layout, flexbox and grid, spacing, sizing, typography, background, borders, effect, filters , transition etc.
Javascript syntax, js classes, objects, function, async, HTML Dom, Json and ES6 etc.
JSX, Componenets, props, events, router, react hooks, functional components, lifting state up etc.
